New Records: Nikola Jokić and Russell Westbrook became the first pair of teammates to record triple-doubles in the same game multiple times in the same season.
Key Match Events: Nikola Jokić had 35 points on 14-of-21 shooting, 15 assists and 12 rebounds in 38 minutes.
Russell Westbrook finished with 25 points, 11 rebounds and 10 assists in 36 minutes.
Pre-Game Insights: Aaron Gordon's injury led to Nikola Jokić and Russell Westbrook forming a strong central force.
Post-Match Reflections: The Nuggets have climbed up to fourth in the Western Conference standings with a 22-15 record.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Nuggets are within three games of the Houston Rockets for the No. 2 seed.
The duo of Jokić and Westbrook has acclimated nicely to playing with each other.
Others: The Nuggets secured their sixth win in the past eight games with a 124-105 victory over the Brooklyn Nets.
